meanings.definition: The act or practice of a Hindu widow immolating herself on her husband's funeral pyre.
meanings.sent1: In some cultures, suttees were seen as a way to honor the deceased husband.
meanings.sent2: The tradition of suttees has been banned in many countries due to safety concerns.
meanings.sent3: At the funeral, the widow jokingly said she would perform suttees to join her husband sooner.
meanings.sent4: The concept of suttees can be seen as a sacrifice for eternal love.
meanings.sent5: The image of suttees is both tragic and powerful, symbolizing devotion and loss.

meanings.definition: A Hindu widow who immolates herself on her husband's funeral pyre.
meanings.sent1: The villagers mourned the loss of the suttees who chose to follow tradition.
meanings.sent2: Historically, some women felt pressured to become suttees against their will.
meanings.sent3: The young widow was determined to become a suttees to honor her late husband.
meanings.sent4: Her decision to become a suttees shocked the community, sparking debates on tradition.
meanings.sent5: The legend of the brave suttees continues to inspire stories of sacrifice and love.
